website_summaries.verdict: An elegant piece befitting a barrister's office, this case supports 110 pounds. A great value for the price.
pros: Though not made from real wood, owners praise its attractive appearance and surprising sturdiness
cons: Some owners inadvertently damaged the unit while assembling it
The dark cherry finish shows dust and fingerprints

customer_reviews.title: Good bookcases for shelving a small library
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf is sturdy. Nice solid color.They have a design similar to solid wood and not particle board. There were no chips and all the parts were accurately provided. I bought two of these bookcases. My first one was a complete success. The second box had a glitch with panels having holes too small for the dowels to fit and they were misaligned. I contacted Sauder and informed them of this mishap. They made a verification of purchase and immediately shipped out replacements. I had them within 48hrs. It took me an hour for each bookshelf to be put together. Always check inventory prior to assembly.
customer_reviews.author: J.Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy AND Nice Looking
customer_reviews.text: These have been great. I purchased three to use as game shelves behind our couch in our great room. My husband had very little trouble putting them together - the only thing that went somewhat wrong was that the top is fairly thin, so on the first one he tightened the screw and it almost popped through the top. After that little learning experience, though, he didn't try to tighten so much and the others came out looking great. We have been using them for several months and they look great and are sturdy enough to stand up to three kids grabbing games and throwing them back in all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Schulte

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design resulted in damaged top
customer_reviews.text: I like the color, design, and overall quality of the bookcase. Unfortunately, the design of the top shelf is faulty. The front top piece screws into the top. The way that the guide holes are drilled allow the screws to be pushed through the top. So, now the top is damaged in two places. Unsightly. They could easily make the holes so that it would be impossible to damage the top or they could have supplied shorter screws. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: DC Bill

customer_reviews.title: Great shelf for cost
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in combo with another sauder heritage shelves. The are great and pretty dark wood was close enough match to other that difference is not noticeable
customer_reviews.author: Apz!

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: Well... statistically you would think at least one of the two products purchased wouldn’t be broken... however this is why I don’t play the lottery. Both bookcases had cracks in the top shelf. One (shown) is very significant and is on the area that faces up. The other one has the crack that faces down but will still compromise the integrity of the top. It took a lot of effort to get all this unboxed and I’m not boxing it up again... Sauder can send me 2 new tops (uncracked please) or I won’t even bother putting this together.
customer_reviews.author: dr. laura

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a more "adult" bookcase for my studio apartment. This is perfect. The wood is thick and sturdy. The unit isn't very heavy when empty. Great shelf depth! It took me 30 min to assemble, but I'm pretty handy (not a professional though). I purchased black (pic attached).
customer_reviews.author: Antwon

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLLENT!  Look no further!
customer_reviews.text: Great little bookcase! Easy assembly with only a screwdriver (phillips) and hammer required. The bookcase was packed extremely well - heavy cardboard "bumpers" around all edges of the box, then shrink wrapped. Absolutely PERFECT way to ship such a heavy item! Assembly took a mere 1/2 hour, all by myself. No damage to the bookcase anywhere. My only wishes are: MORE nails to hold the back piece on, and separate the pieces into smaller bags by part. It's easy for them to get lost (or stolen by a cat) when you have to dump all the different hardware out at the same time! Would highly recommend...and would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the money
customer_reviews.text: A nice looking bookcase for the money. It is not real wood, but it is fairly heavy and looks nice. Easy to assemble. After a year, and with cookbooks stored in it, there is slight sagging in the shelf. Someone asked about this in the Q&A section.
customer_reviews.author: Woot

customer_reviews.title: Suggest replacing the 1 1/8" Screws With 1"
customer_reviews.text: Strongly suggest replacing the 3 1 1/8" screws that are provided with this item with 1" screws. All three screws penetrated through the top of my brand new bookcase during installation of the top front piece of trim. Likely the countersink holes drilled by the factory in the piece of trim were drilled slightly deeper than they should have been and the result is three ugly holes the the "most visible" section of this bookcase. I will contact Sauder and see if they are willing to replace the top section, but what a disappointment. I've attached pictures so you can see this. Aside from what I described above, this unit is "fit for purpose".
customer_reviews.author: Razzierb

customer_reviews.title: Our house was built in the 1920's and has really nice woodwork and built-in cabinets in our living room so ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this bookcase to hold the tons of books we have for our toddler. Our house was built in the 1920's and has really nice woodwork and built-in cabinets in our living room so we were a little worried about if this would stand out from the rest of the room. I am happy to report that it fits right in and matches our wood perfectly! Overall it seems very sturdy, the only slight complaint I have is that the back board (cardboard) was slightly larger than the back of the unit so one corner is sticking about a half mm above the top left corner of the bookcase. No one other than me would probably notice that though.
customer_reviews.author: EricM229

customer_reviews.title: An excellent purchase for displaying books.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 7 Sauder bookcases (2 shelf and 5 shelf) through Amazon at various different times in the past year. None came damaged, all came with all the pieces and fasteners, and all were easy to assemble (even for someone who is in his '80's and never worked with tools for a living). They look good and admirably perform the function of a bookcase-- to hold books.
customer_reviews.author: Jczarfill

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and ready to collapse.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought $300 bookshelves, $50 bookshelves, and $20 bookshelves. Unlike this bookshelf, the screws for them worked. The locking peg system for this bookshelf would likely hold 20 lbs before falling apart. I think the pegs are too small for the drilled holes, as other reviews say. Additionally, while putting this together the sharp edges of the slide-together pressboard shelving left me with some pretty gnarly cuts on my fingers. Overall a pretty terrible bookshelf. Its sharp and likely to collapse. One star because it looks moderate. The back of it, like most bookshelves, is the cheap fold-out cardboard backing that gives away how cheap it is.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Assembling is challenging
customer_reviews.text: Assembly directions to put the bookcase together was very poor.. the pieces need to be marked the direction they are suppose to go. I had to take it apart and I never have seen the type of screw before and I was dumbfounded how to remove them so I could put the boards together correctly. Since it was just me doing it, I was very frustrated plus the sides collapsed on me ruining the particle board. Somehow the bookcase stayed together. It was not perfect but decent enough to use. I like the color of the particle board since it matched the desk that I had purchased.
customer_reviews.author: KATHLEEN EVANS

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person!
customer_reviews.text: This isn't your typical sauder piece- it has thick trim on the front that makes it look more like real wood. We didn't want to spend a lot on a small bookcase, but found that all the ones we saw in the affordable range were very tacky and looked cheap. We found this one and took a chance, and are more than happy with it. I put it together in about 20 minutes by myself- from unboxing to putting it in place upstairs!
customer_reviews.author: angela rossi

customer_reviews.title: Bottom line:  Not "salt oak" shelves -- shelves are oak in color.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived rather quickly; torn box but no damage to shelves. I could see through the large tear in the box that the shade of the shelves was NOT "salt oak." It looked like plain ole' oak to me which was not what I wanted. We had picked this mainly for the lighter shade of oak. "Salt Oak" is misrepresented. Had to return - a bit of a hassle but it's done. So don't buy based on color!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised how nice this bookcase looks
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how nice this bookcase looks. We needed a smallish bookcase for one area of the house. We tried multiple furniture stores in our area, but most stores do not carry 2-shelf cases. My husband decided this was the one he wanted after we looked online, but I was concerned that it would look "cheap". Even though the cost was modest and we did have to assemble this piece, it looks very stylish in our home. The bookcase pieces came in a very rugged carton and assembly went well.
customer_reviews.author: White Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: One area where a slight improvement would help. The TOP MOLDING has three counterbored holes in which are located the screws which attach the molding to the bookcase top. It may be that the depth of the counterbore is excessive. A slight overage of the depth of same can/will result in the pan head screw breaking through the top of case. I recently purchased two bookcases, and on the second one I assembled, I did just that: broke through.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas U. Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Cheap back - self destructed
customer_reviews.text: It's a fine looking bookcase with one major flaw that totally spoiled it for us. The back is made out of paperboard with a wood finish on one side. It's less than 1/16" thick and it has now warped and curled three days after assembly. It looks terrible.
customer_reviews.author: MtLagunaNed

customer_reviews.title: Book case well designed and attractive.  Fit together well.
customer_reviews.text: Flat package ready to assemble arrived in good condition and time as promised. The book case is attractively finished, the assembly holes were of the proper diameter and precisely placed. Instruction were excellent and thorough. Laid it out on the living room carpet and put it together with my screwdriver set and an old hammer. Walked it into place in the next room--it's quite heavy, you know. I am an 85 year old male and have assembled many item such as this. I also think the design is excellent in that all horizontal surfaces are reinforced with stout trim.
customer_reviews.author: N. Jacques

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I have had several pieces of furniture by Sauder over the years and have been satisfied with every piece. This bookcase is no exception. I am not the most adept assembler of furniture so there could have been more precision to the instructions; however, the errors I made in assembling the bookcase were pretty easy to retrace the assembly process in order to correct my errors. As with all furniture by Sauder that I have had, the sturdiness and attractive appearance are the two best qualities.
customer_reviews.author: film fancier

customer_reviews.title: Short sturdy and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter’s room. I was looking for a short, sturdy, affordable bookcase and this definitely fit the bill! It’s very heavy and substantial feeling, which makes me feel like it won’t tip over. I love that it was less than $100. My husband put it together in about an hour and I heard minimal cussing, so that means it was probably pretty easy. No complaints! This is exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Good Bookcase, Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a good-looking sturdy bookcase with two spacious shelves and a large area on top. Note that this bookcase is not made of sold wood. It is made of pressed wood with an attractive dark brown wood veneer. It was not difficult to assemble as indicated by the fact that I put it together with a painful injured hand. Despite its weight and assembled size, the bookcase was delivered unassembled in a box smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Good engineering offsets the cheap materials.
customer_reviews.text: Looks very nice and satisfied my need for a combo electronics/bookcase shelf unit. This is a you get what you pay for product. You can't expect solid furniture at this price. However, even thought they've used the cheapest materials possible (wow), they've done such an admirable job engineering the construction that the unit is reasonably sturdy and the appearance is quite good ( as long as you fill it up, the black cardboard back would bug me if I didn't have it hidden by stuff, the front facing pieces do a good job of looking like real wood tho.)
customer_reviews.author: gordon77

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than picture shows.
customer_reviews.text: Much darker in color than I expected. Almost a black, not as light red as picture. I even double checked if wrong color was sent. I kept it anyway because too difficult to return. Other than that it went together easy enough and looks good. Just that color........
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to match the desk I bought of the same brand. It's very high quality for the price, well packaged to prevent damage, and easy to assemble. I assembled it in about 45 minutes. The instructions can be followed without any confusion and the pieces/hardware are easy to identify. The bookcase is very sturdy once assembled. I really appreciate that Sauder puts so much focus into packing their products well to prevent damage in transit. This is the 2nd Sauder product I've bought from Amazon, and both survived transit due to the excellent packing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Hanks

customer_reviews.title: great instructions
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice-looking bookcase. All the parts were in the box and in good shape. What stood out was the detailed (and funny) instructions. Not funny - horribly frustrating. Funny - put you in a better mood. There were the usual struggles with kit furniture, but all the necessary holes had been drilled. To screw in the base moulding was a terrible job. I'm going to try the second kit flipping the partially assembled bookcase on its front so I can see what I'm doing with the screws on the underside of the bookcase; also going to try using a power drill instead of plain old elbow grease and phillips head.
customer_reviews.author: considered comment

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great, Nice Price
customer_reviews.text: Got it in today. Well packed for shipping: Wrapped in heavy plastic and box had corner and edge guards. Assembly took about 45 minutes. Instructions somewhat elementary but drawings helped alot. All the hardware worked well -no shortages. I liked the finishing touches that framed the opening and the front edge of the shelf. Its a touch one wouldn’t have expected at the price of the case. The back is the usual cardboard cover. I am using this case to hold a TV, so had to cut out an access slot at the top. After assembly, the look was great! Looked like it cost twice the cost. Very pleased and can recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: MrEd

customer_reviews.title: Seemed great until I finished putting it together and saw that ...
customer_reviews.text: Seemed great until I finished putting it together and saw that two screws were sticking out of the top through the finished wood. Be very careful screwing on the top front edge piece. Manufacturer really needs to use shorter screws on this section. I’m not about to take it apart and send it back now. I guess I will just cover the two spots up with something.
customer_reviews.author: Snoopy67

customer_reviews.title: Good, Solid Value
customer_reviews.text: I'm legally blind and was able to put these shelves together without too much trouble. Instructions were a little sketchy and some of the pieces weren't labelled, which had me scratching my head, trying to match them to the diagrams, but overall it was easy peasy. The shelf itself looks nice, and is sturdy and well constructed. Quite happy with that aspect. The finish is good, but fit is just a tad off in places, namely on the front bottom trim. I actually ended up buying a second one because the first one worked out so well.
customer_reviews.author: Chigley Wigley

customer_reviews.title: The screws they sent with his unit aren't the right size?!
customer_reviews.text: Was extremely unhappy with the screws they sent with the unit follow directions to the t, use a handheld screwdriver as recommended. And still two screws went right through the top of my unit!! I threw the box away prior to putting it together so I guess I'm screwed make sure the screws you get aren't too long!! Unhappy customer with this product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love how this looks in my room. It arrived in the mail quickly and was pretty easy to put together, just follow the instructions. Pay close attention to where all the pre-drilled holes are and where each part is supposed to go, I rushed into it and had to build it twice because I had the bottom part flipped the wrong way. The back is just a thin board that you unfold and nail to the back of the bookshelf. It doesn't look bad, but it looks rather cheap compared to the rest of the the structure. It doesn't bother me, you really can't see it once the shelves are loaded.
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best bang for your buck, and matches all of my furniture that's over 100 years old and top quality. Beautiful finish, easy assembly, and metal dowels that allow you to easily change the height of the shelves easily whenever you feel like it! Currently used as my TV stand, holds up great, and not to mention easy to clean! Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bookcase, and this was the perfect size I needed. Takes about 30 minutes to put it together (only because it's the first time). If I had a second to assemble it wouldn't have taken but 15 minutes. Flexable middle shelf will help you if you have any tall books. The back, is of course very thin sheet, but with all the nails they provide, it'll be there and be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Autryboss

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bookshelf for the price! We just needed something in our bedroom to hold some odds and ends books. I wanted something that looked nice, but wasn't going to cost a lot. This is perfect. It looks very classy and sleek, has more than enough storage, and was fairly easy to assemble. My only complaint, is when I was nailing the back on, it immediately cracked the side of the shelf (first nail). Luckily I was able to cover the crack, but it was very annoying - but to be expected with this price!
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: It looks a little off while putting on the back, but just go with it because I tried to make it fit only for it to be slightly off. Anyway, we put it in the kitchen to hold all our crock pots and large TV-infomercial cooking gadgets, with the coffee maker and microwave on top. Helped clear up a lot of counter/cabinet space.
customer_reviews.author: Shar Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great, Sturdy Shelf
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, quality looking shelf except the three 1 1/8" screws for attaching the top piece must be gently screwed in with a phillips screwdriver, not a drill, and not too tight as they will damage the top by poking thru. Other than this, the assembly was easy with clear instructions and shelf looks like high quality piece~
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble but look solid
customer_reviews.text: I needed a lot of low bookshelves to store the toys my children used when they were younger for "the next generation." These bookshelves were low enough that they did not obscure the view from the windows of the room and so that kids could easily remove the toys. What I really liked is that they were sturdy and after assembly did not look like they were "put together" by us, but rather by a real carpenter. The only problem was that since they were so heavy the outer, thin cardboard boxes they were shipped in ripped, but luckily the bookcases were not damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Occhipinti

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I order this to put towels on it in my new bathroom, I have real wood cherry cabinets in my bathroom and I figured I take a chance on this, the price was right and if it didn't work out I could use it as a book case. I was really surprise to see when I was finish that they look as good as the $2500 cabinets I have in stalled! You would be hard press to tell the difference. The only thing I would say is, I wish they wood use some kind of real hardwood where the screw parts get screwed, to make it more sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: OldiesRock

customer_reviews.title: Good for me but you won't win prizes for house decorating
customer_reviews.text: Great for my office. I've used it 3 months, spilled coffee and water on it and it held up fine. Putting it together took longer then expected and I have done many of these types of assembly before. Typical heavy box and you don't want to move it after you assemble the parts. It holds my printer, briefcase, coffee mug and desk phone. pros: looks good, sturdy enough, inexpensive, does the job cons: heavy box to carry, assembly was slower than expected meh: the look
customer_reviews.author: over analyzer

customer_reviews.title: 8 of the 15 bookcases had damage to the top;  split laminate and damage to board.
customer_reviews.text: No excuse for similar damage to 8 of the 15 cabinets ordered for the New Jersey Maritime Museum. It appears that perhaps someone at the factor dropped a pallet of these, resulting in the damage to the top section of these cases. It's unrealistic to disassemble 15 bookcases to return to the manufacturer; if these damaged tops aren't replaced (which will still require the cabinets to be disassembled just to replaced the damaged tops) I will have no choice but to have the company pick them up. UPDATE: Spoke to Barb at Sauder and she is sending out replacement tops for the damaged units.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah C. Whitcraft

customer_reviews.title: UNBELIEVABLE!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered this bookcase, I was a bit hesitant due to the more than reasonable price. When I opened the box (extremely well packed) I took out all the parts and thought, great, another KD piece of furniture that's going to be a pain to assemble. Boy was I wrong. I started to assemble the case and each and every part was perfect and manufactured to a machinists specs! I have never seen a piece of KD furniture as perfect as this! Kudos to the manufacturer. My only word of caution is read and follow the instructions carefully. There are a few parts that can be installed backwards and naturally, I did so! Easy to take apart and correct.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for limited wall space!
customer_reviews.text: Worked out great for my cookbooks. Wanted something to fit under large window area in my dinning room, and these fit perfectly under the window. Bought two of them and put them side by side. The shelves were tall enough to hold larger books, but the unit was short enough to slip under my window sill.
customer_reviews.author: V. Kingen

customer_reviews.title: At your own risk
customer_reviews.text: I give this item a 4 star. It looks good and holds the books real well. However, we ordered two for our daughters room and both shelfs came damaged. We had to return those which was no easy task trying to put pack them back in their original box. After receiving another two and putting them together, they looked great. No thanks to FL humidity however, the back panel warped. Probably should have acclimated it to our home temperature before putting it together the same day, just a fair warning.
customer_reviews.author: Tausha S. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Good solid product
customer_reviews.text: I love sauder products. They really are the best quality for diy type projects in a very low price category. I have never been disappointed. The instructions are very clear and easy to understand and allow you to put together the bookshelf quickly. It is also very sturdy and is perfect for my 8 year old sons room.
customer_reviews.author: C. Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking bookcase, but will it last?
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble: Took less than an hour for a single person. Two catches: do NOT overtighten the screw on step 3, or they will pierce the top panel, and invert the order on step 5, i.e loosely mount the 5 brackets on the base (M48) first. This is engineer pressed wood, but it does look good, apart from a small scratch (will need some touch up). The laminate finish is paper-thin, and we'll have to see how well it will resist the injuries of time. At a cost of $44, I'm happy with the price-quality of the item.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble - looks terrific
customer_reviews.text: excellent design and construction - clear instructions written in (American) English with a full parts list - all pieces fit perfectly - all holes lined up as intended - finished product is beautiful - very sturdy - terrific value - similar size bookcases are twice the price
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Damaged parts but it does the job
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my home office and this piece fit the space under my window perfectly. Cheap material that came damaged (see photos). I was surprised to find as many damaged pieces once I opened it because it was packed very well. Assembly was fairly easy but took longer than expected due to me trying to make damaged parts fit into each other. Since it's really only me that's going to look at it, it does the job but I would have expected better quality due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M

customer_reviews.title: Happy With the Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The assembling of these book cases was easy. The directions and drawings make it easy. All the hardware was included. The only thing I would warn you about is the thinness of the top layer. It does damage easily. So be careful with handling the pieces. You cannot undo if you rip it. Over all, a good product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: We needed a small bookcase for my newborn's growing collection. I didn't expect much from this product, as I generally don't with online furniture. But this piece is wonderful! It has a beautiful, rich, black color. There is detailed beveling in the upper and lower ledges. You can adjust the shelves, so we have books of all sizes in here. You have to assemble this piece, but it was very easy to do. I love that the center, adjustable shelf has a thick lip to it; it is a really refined touch that gives this case a sophisticated look. Absolutely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Shan Kay

customer_reviews.title: don't do it
customer_reviews.text: I am a female with no building experience...I bought 2 of these...identical....The 1st one the cam burst thru the top ruining it..SO, with the 2nd one, I vowed not to tighten the top cams...BAM...the same thing....in the same location...Honestly, i wonder if the cam holes were drilled at the inappropriate depth.. its really ugly now..I can't believe Saunders has sunk this low...Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: DEL

customer_reviews.title: It is a beautiful piece of furniture for the price
customer_reviews.text: The bookcase arrived with a crack along the top shelf. Since it took me so long to unpack it, I was not willing to pack it up again and send it back. I'm elderly and disabled so unpacking the heavy bookshelf was quite a chore. It is a beautiful piece of furniture for the price, however.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Woods

customer_reviews.title: Needlessly difficult to assemble, lowest possible quality
customer_reviews.text: This is quite simply the worst piece of furniture I have ever purchased in my entire life. The assembly makes Ikea look like BMW. It simply makes no sense, is over complicated, and if you follow the instructions you are very likely to destroy it before you ever get it made. Once it is made, it comes all nicked up, uneven finish, imperfect alignment, the entire thing is trash from beginning to end, and will absolutely be the last piece of Sauder furniture I buy. In the past I have had good experiences with them, but this is just an engineering fiasco.
customer_reviews.author: thetrentonian

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these to go into our guest bedroom. Didn't need anything fancy, and that is what these are. The instructions were excellent and very easy to put together. One of the book cases has a subtle fracture that runs about 7 inches across the top, and the other one has a slight break from one of the screws pushing through the top. For that reason I deducted one star, but you get what you pay for, and they serve their purpose.
customer_reviews.author: AZ_Boilermaker

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, budget priced
customer_reviews.text: For a low-price bookcase, this is nice looking and seems quite sturdy. It arrived very quickly in flawless condition. Assembly took about 45 minutes (with a couple of interruptions). It is in a corner of a room where we have nice cherry finished furniture; it fits in with the other furniture. For the money, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous shelf
customer_reviews.text: So far, this shelf has held up to all of the board books and giant storybooks that my three-year-old has received over his lifetime. We had previously stored the books on a cheap-o shelf from the local big box store and that thing caved in a matter of months. Assembly was relatively easy when following instructions. I love the way this shelf looks in my living room and I know it will grow with our family with ease since it doesn't come with painted trains and alphabet letters on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship is very good and better yet, all the parts fit together and were there :0). If the assembly instructions are properly followed, the buyer will have himself/herself a very stylish bookcase sturdy enough to support most things save maybe an elephant. Maximum shelf loading is given to ensure that everyone is happy with the final result.
customer_reviews.author: P. Porter

customer_reviews.title: Nice but some issues
customer_reviews.text: Received quickly and all parts were in good condition, no scratches or damage. It went together easily but I’m disappointed with it. This is the third piece of of Sauder furniture I’ve put together in a week and this one is just not as solid. Main issue is the trim pieces, even though all the screws are tightened some pieces are still a little lose and show small gaps.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten S

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bookcase for more storage in my art studio. It looks amazing fully finished, is heavy/sturdy and looks more expensive than what it is. I was, however, a bit disappointed during assembly. Most Sauder products are very high quality with excellent craftsmanship, this one .... missed the mark. A few spots do not line up perfectly leaving unstained wood visible. This is by no more than a few millimeters and I concealed this with a touch of black marker, but I would have expected more from Sauder.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: Great small bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this bookcase. It is not solid wood, but it feels like it is. It is really sturdy and heavy. The fit and finish and quality is very high. Much better than the price paid implies. I liked it so much I bought another one. It took me 1 hour to build by myself. I took my time, but it probably can be built much faster if you are handy. The product description is accurate (35" Length, 13" Depth, 30" Height).
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Came without assembly instructions
customer_reviews.text: Searched the box and double searched it but this shelf came without assembly instructions. I might not have written the bad review if the Sauder website had provided a downloadable version of the instructions, but instead they make you fill out your bar code number to have the instructions sent by snail mail. Unacceptable in this day and age.
customer_reviews.author: J Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice-looking and sturdy for the price, but the stain is not at all what I expected. I ordered "oiled oak," but what I received is closer to a walnut. Given the price, it isn't worth the trouble to return it, but I don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: CC - Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, nice color, decent price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two. They look good and went together easy. The price was much, much less than actual wooden bookshelves that I couldn't find in the correct color anyway. As long as you aren't picking these up loaded with books, they should last many many years. Dropped a star rating because the underside of the top veneer had a visual crack in it, but you can't see it unless you put your head inside the bookshelves... and definitely not worth returning.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A. Philhower

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions first!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually a pretty nice book shelf. I have learned from my past mistakes assembling furniture to read the instructions first, lay out the material and hardware to ensure everything is there. Second..follow the instructions and don't assume anything or you will be dissembling something and re-doing it. The quality is nice as is the fit and finish. Lastly, Follow The Instructions!!
customer_reviews.author: nevadatraveler

customer_reviews.title: A good little $60 bookshelf
customer_reviews.text: If you keep in mind that this is a $60 bookshelf made out of composite and printed boards you’ll be very happy. This is not a $500 bookshelf made by the Amish in the old country. It is extremely sturdy and the boards are much thicker than other ones I’ve had. There is plenty of room and it looks nice in my office. It came in extremely sturdy box, I was very impressed how well they packaged it. It took 15 minutes to build and has taken several beatings from the kids with no issues or major scratches
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gutekunst

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically Pleasing Sturdy Bookcase
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both educators with a passion for reading. We have a small apartment and a plethora of books. I bought this bookshelf in different colors for different rooms. Not too difficult or too time-consuming to assemble, with great quality, strength, and beauty. A thousand times better than IKEA. I strongly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Inspector or pieces very closely before simply for damage
customer_reviews.text: Recieved it with a dented damaged shelf and cracked top. Fortunately enough it's in places you cannot see. what is more upsetting the hell is some of the screws are too long in the protrude through the finished ends of the cabinet in certain places. That should not happen when you're using just a screwdriver in no power tools. Was going to use it for my office at home but now I think I'll just use it for storage in my garage. Not worth the effort or time to return it
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS MORGADO

customer_reviews.title: Suprisngly nice for this price point.
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and very substantial, especially for the price. Unfortunately, it is possible to tighten a screw connecting the rest with the top tightly enough that it actually pushed up the veneer on the top surface. To be fair, the directions said to not tighten it too tight, so it was my fault. It did not have that plasticy look that inexpensive furniture often has.
customer_reviews.author: ellen sf

customer_reviews.title: Affordable elegance and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: It was very simply to put together. Probably the most straight-forward instructions, I have ever seen for a product like this. It is composite but it did not splinter or crack when I nailed in the tacks for the back. All of the pre-drilled holes were perfect and no screws went through to the opposite end and damaged the product as noted in another review. The color is true to the images shown on Amazon and it matched my cherry desk perfectly. Its definitely not the fanciest shelf but for the price, I feel it is very elegant for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Built to Last
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice book shelves that, if put together correctly, will last many years. They are much better than the average big store (ie: WM) book shelves. If you are looking for quality, these can't be beat for the price.
customer_reviews.author: WeekendWarrior2017

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking study bookcase
customer_reviews.text: I have bought Sauder products before and the ease of putting them together especially with the locking hardware has always been what has kept me coming back to their product. All items labeled with easy to read instructions and yes I do read and follow the instructions. Looks great none of the problems that I saw with earlier reviews so maybe they corrected some of the flaws. This was bought to use as a TV stand for my mother and got it in the cherry and it is a beautiful rich color. Excellent product and I would recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: nana

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful thick quality shelving that holds three bins across
customer_reviews.text: To answer your question, YES, it holds three 11" bins across, and can actually do it on both shelves!! I wanted to get a new bookshelf for my sons room and wanted to use it for storage too. Too many shelves are too narrow or not deep enough, or the shelving is misplaced and the top shelf would be too narrow. Not this one. Fantastic quality shelving. Has a good weight to it, very attractive molding, a very dark brown/Expresso color. Note it does NOT come with a wall brace, so you'll have to go to a hardware store to find something if its going in a kids room.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M. Millard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I love these book cases....I bought two. They do need to be assembled, but I was able to assemble them myself without any problems. It took less than an hour to assemble each one. They look very nice and I love the deep, rich color.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi917

customer_reviews.title: Quality look & feel
customer_reviews.text: This looks much nicer than expected. It seems very sturdy and looks great! I think it is great for classy looking home decor on a budget. It took a little bit to properly orient myself to the individual pieces before putting it together but after that easy assembly. The package is pretty heavy when it arrives (just FYI). The only reason i did not give 5 stars is that the middle shelf does not sit flush with sides ( minor cosmetic issue) because it is an adjustable shelf. Also be careful when nailing in the back or you can put a nail through the sides and that will knock out a large chunk.
customer_reviews.author: Fit-gamer

customer_reviews.title: The finished product is nice for the
customer_reviews.text: Second item purchased from Sauder. If you take your time and lay it out, read the instructions and pay attention to the detailed illustrations they are not difficult to assemble and it is remarkable how the parts and screws line up with such accuracy. The finished product is nice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: not perfect but works for us
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly high quality but it works for what we are using it for, a collection of antique books from my childhood( Hardy Boys and Nancy drew)..I would not be storing heavy things on the top shelf as this is mostly fiberboard..but if you are not into storing bowling balls..you should be fine
customer_reviews.author: Aoibheil

customer_reviews.title: Looks more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.text: Not many will be fooled into thinking this is fine furniture, but it looks very respectable considering its cost. Easy to assemble alone. Very sturdy. Nice design details.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Amq
customer_reviews.text: love this i bought the wall bookcase unit first took 4 hrs to assemble,bumps,scratches and minor mistakes made by me not the instructions. i decised to purchase the bookcase took 45mins to assemble. now waiting on a nightstand to use as a side table. about $525 total for three pieces to refresh living room
customer_reviews.author: Luna

customer_reviews.title: Well made shelves
customer_reviews.text: I love these shelves. I bought 2 of them and put them together myself. It was an easy assemble. My husband and I put them up on the wall. We have a piece of wood under them and an angle iron across the top edge for a good support. There was one tiny bit of damage on the top back edge of one of them. I blame it on the UPS delivery... they are so ruff.
customer_reviews.author: SteelerLover

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: I got the book shelf to match the entertainment center. It only took about 45 minutes to assemble (while I watched Netflix), and I was able to do it completely by myself. The instructions are very detailed and easy to follow, and all pieces are clearly labeled to avoid any confusion about what goes where. It looks a lot nicer than any furniture that you would purchase from Ikea, and its excellent value for the cost. I've only had it for about 6 months, but it's held up to wear and tear quit well so far, and is extremely sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: First time to order kick-down furniture on-line and this was a nice surprise. Quality looks good for the price and I was pleased with the easy assembly. Instructions are right on....just follow the steps. Only problem I had was "user error" in attaching the back panel --- thought I had it lined up correctly and was inserting nails correctly but two nails came through on the inside --- not noticeable when books are on shelves. Again...that was my doing, not fault of the bookcase :-)
customer_reviews.author: Portland Guy

customer_reviews.title: looks nice, but poor construction
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap, and it looks good, but it is extremely flimsy. There are some basic problems with assembly, and the wood pieces don't really end up being secured together. The top came off when I was moving it, and there is no reason to think it shouldn't. I'd guess it would be simple to add some wood glue to make it a bit better, but that really shouldn't be needed for this sort of furniture. I don't think the point on construction and hardware here has to do with price...it is higher quality in terms of design and wood quality than a number of other such things I've bought, and most have far sturdier designs.
customer_reviews.author: kali

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to assemble and handsome too!
customer_reviews.text: While I don't expect these particle board bookcases to last for a lifetime, they are extremely well designed and engineered. The assembly instruction book is well written and illustrated, better than any I have ever seen. I would definitely recommend this modestly priced bookcase.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: This Is VERY Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: If I could have given this shelf minus stars I would have done so. I bought the Cherry finish and had to go over every seam and edge with a wood coloring pen because every seam was white. The back of the shelf is basically cardboard. If you want something to last longer than a year, don't buy this brand.
customer_reviews.author: peggy

customer_reviews.title: dont move it
customer_reviews.text: Product is pretty easy to assemble. It does look good when you are finished. However, if you move it, it will fall apart. Product fell apart on me and I am not a novice at putting these projects together.
customer_reviews.author: KKS

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how well built this shelf was. Its not to heavy but its not like some that if you look at them they fall apart. This looks and feels like as if it were real cherry wood. Befor we purchased. I was woried with a large happy dog him knocking it over with his tail. Then it arrived and we started setting it up. Which a gain was very easy. No way will just a wag knock it over. Very sturdy. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Russell P.

customer_reviews.title: Budget Friendly, Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking little bookshelf, matches the L-shaped Sauder desk perfectly. Pretty quick and easy to assemble the bookshelf. I do wish it had a more solid backing rather than the thin cardboard type but oh well. Very reasonable price for an otherwise nice looking pretty solid seeming piece of budget furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Marco Esquandolas

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Bookcase - easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice bookcase except for the backing. The backing appears to be cheap cardboard with obvious fold lines. The color matches but the quality of the backing is much less (to the extreme) than the bookcase itself. The bookcase is as sturdy as it purports to be but flexes in the lateral directions. Once set in place, it should be fine to hold some books and home decor. It was easy to assemble with power drill/screw bits in about 40 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Earlene McKenney

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC SMALL BOOKSHELF
customer_reviews.text: Prime shipping arrived in two day and was undamaged. Really packed well with all the parts enclosed. Very simple to put together with easy to follow instructions. If you want to go the extra step ,get a furniture marker and color the raw edges, takes a extra 5 minutes. For $75.00 you can't beat it. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Fincannon

customer_reviews.title: Shelf delivered with scratches!
customer_reviews.text: This bookcase was delivered a week earlier than expected. It was delivered to front porch and with no obvious damage to packaging, but after opening I found a shelf with 2 big scratches across width of the shelf. The damaged shelf was in the middle of the other parts, which had no damage, and leads me to believe it was damaged prior to boxing. It did not affect the sturdiness, but is visually distracting and I am disappointed that there isn’t better inspection before shipping. Just beware when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, strong and looks really nice! I have purchased a lot of furniture pieces from Sauder because their prices are low, their instructions for assembly are excellent, and once you have the product assembled, it looks fantastic and is strong and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: flutterby4x

customer_reviews.title: Quality product, with all the parts
customer_reviews.text: I loved the color and the sturdy construction. Assembly was easy except for the base hinges..trying to get them just right . Only problem was the back is very difficult to get perfectly flat across the top to ensure you have no gaps where the back attached to the top of the bookcase. A really nice piece for the money!
customer_reviews.author: larry baker

customer_reviews.title: Lower Quality Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: The bookshelf looks higher-end in the photo, but disappoints in person. There are many ends that are not finished, but are covered by finished pieces- the problem is, these finished pieces do not completely hide the unfinished parts and it looks bad. The worse thing about this bookshelf is the back is wavy. In shipping the finished back is tri-folded and once unfolded and assembled it is apparent with 3 distinct bows for everyone to see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this item
customer_reviews.text: It took me a while to get to setting them up. The items are really low quality, some of the panels look like they had been stripped o fed the wood like paper that covers it. By the time I opened the package the return date had expired. I do not recommend this item at all.
customer_reviews.author: Dissapointed

customer_reviews.title: Superb product -- looks great AND was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit dubious about ordering such a large heavy item via Amazon -- but it arrived both on time and in perfect condition. Assembly was not difficult. I have assembled other Sauder bookshelves in the past and was pleased to find that they had found a way to improve upon their previously flawless and easy assembly process. The finish and color of the shelves were exactly what we saw on the screen and wanted.
customer_reviews.author: John Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: High quality product and affordable price- great value
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Liked the 1st one so much I bought a 2nd one! Very easy to assemble and higher quality materials. Looking at it and using it, you can’t tell it’s a pre-fab product and has same feel as my solid wood book case. I have them at end of couch and love seat as dual function bookcase and end table
customer_reviews.author: T. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Crappy item
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed in this. Some hardware was just enough pieces and damaged. I thought back was wood but is cardboard like you get on junk cannot still get on bottom piece. HAve to go to hardware store to replace some hardware to try and get it sturdy with their suggestions. Could have purchased elsewhere and seen what was actually getting and would have been assembled. I shop amazon a lot and am normally happy but this is a piece of crappy junk. Nothing was put in tighter than recommendation either!
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Andrus

customer_reviews.title: Chalked Chesnut is a light gray
customer_reviews.text: Decent bookshelf for small spaces. Arrived in mint condition. It took about 45 minutes to an hour to put together, taking our time to follow directions carefully. The chalked chestnut wash is beautiful. I would consider it more of a light gray color.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice piece of furniture. It's not like the usual mass produced put-togethers, the final product is heavy, sturdy-heavy and looks and feels much more expensive. I just needed a little bookshelf but got a very nice piece of furniture that will last forever.
customer_reviews.author: Steve613

customer_reviews.title: Sauder 2 shelf bookcase. Black.
customer_reviews.text: Used this bookcase for the dining room for wife's cooking books. Easy to assemble except the screws to mount the upper trim work were too long and consequently started coming through the top. So I had to back them off. Other than that disappointment we like the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best quality at a very good price!
customer_reviews.text: I Love love love this bookcase. The quality is outstanding. My 14-year old put it together in about 15 minutes. The color is exactly what I wanted. There is NOTHING I don’t love about it!!! It’s even bigger than I imagined. All of my books should fit on here. ❤️❤️
customer_reviews.author: Cricket1972

product_meta.title: Sauder 2-Shelf Bookcase, Select Cherry finish
product_meta.description: Color:Select Cherry FinishLooking to add crisp, clean style to your home decor while creating optimal storage space? Look no further! This 2-shelf bookcase from the Sauder Select collection is everything you need and more. This attractive bookcase features a large adjustable shelf that is ideal for storing and displaying your collection of favorite books, decorative plants, work binders and your assortment of knick-knacks too. It has room for all your stuff! The adjustable shelf has the ability to move to different heights to create flexible storage options for items off all shapes and sizes. It's spacious top surface provides you with additional space to display home décor items like an accent lamp, a clock and photos of your family and friends. It adds beauty and functionality no matter where it stands – in the living room, your office, down the hallway or even in the bedroom. Finished in Select Cherry, this beautiful bookcase is the perfect piece for your home.
feature_bullets: One adjustable shelf for flexible storage options
Quick and easy assembly with patented slide-on moldings to save you time
Assembled dimensions: L: 35.276" x W: 13.228" x H: 29.921

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars1,709 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
